trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell ISE Scripting Object Model
trans-unit.target: El modelo de objetos de scripting de ISE de Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell ISE Scripting Object Model
trans-unit.target: El modelo de objetos de scripting de ISE de Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShellÂ® Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) exposes its functionality through an underlying scripting object model that enables users to write Windows PowerShell scripts that manipulate the various visual and functional aspects of the Windows PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: El Entorno de scripting integrado (ISE) de Windows PowerShellÂ® expone su funcionalidad a través de un modelo de objetos de scripting subyacente que permite a los usuarios escribir scripts de Windows PowerShell que manipulan los diversos aspectos visuales y funcionales de Windows PowerShell ISE.

trans-unit.source: Scripting objects, their properties, and their methods are defined specifically for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: Los objetos de scripting, sus propiedades y sus métodos se definen específicamente para esta finalidad.

trans-unit.source: Purpose of the Windows PowerShell ISE Scripting Object Model
trans-unit.target: Finalidad del modelo de objetos de scripting de Windows PowerShell ISE
